1.0.1.name: wordpress/bookitme-weather-station
1.0.1.description:
The Bookitme Weather Station lets you add weather forecast directly into your page and widgets
Simply adding a shortcode [bookitme-weather] [bookitme-weather-json] and to a page. You can set VIDEO or IMAGE for weather forecast background. Parameters are available for setup in the plugin ADMIN interface. See the Plugin screenshots for examples.

This gives your visitors an efficient way to view hourly weather forecast in the nice user friendly form. Shortodes: [bookitme-weather] – display weather forecast on the page or post

[bookitme-weather-json] - plugin return JSON weather forecast data for your next work

Admin Page: Setup API METRIC system and weather background image. If you not specified input parameters in shortcode definition default values from Admin panel will be used.

Bookitme.com System Features
